author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Top news of the day: Non-essential items delivery by e-commerce firms to stay barred till May 3; U.P. hospital tells Muslim patients to get tested for coronavirus, and more
description: The major news headlines of the day, and more.
content: The Ministry of Home Affairs has also issued guidelines for movement of migrant labourers living in relief camps to their workplace, within the boundaries of a State, in areas where lockdown will be relaxed from April 20. The Ministry asserted that there shal… [+3067 chars]
